 2017-07802017-06-20ECCC,  ,  ,  , 
ActFisheries Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Metal Mining Effluent Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the METAL MINING EFFLUENT REGULATIONS in order to allow the use of two fish frequented water bodies (portions of North Treaty Creek and South Teigen Creek) for disposal of tailings from the Kerr-Sulphurets-Mitchell Mine Project.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2017-0128 Publication Date: 2017-07-12
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Metal Mining Effluent Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the METAL MINING EFFLUENT REGULATIONS in order to allow the use of two fish frequented water bodies (portions of North Treaty Creek and South Teigen Creek) for disposal of tailings from the Kerr-Sulphurets-Mitchell Mine Project.
